description: This course is designed to teach students advanced concepts in developing ASP.NET Core MVC, database driven web apps using HTML/CSS and C# in the Visual Studio IDE.
- EF (Entity Framework) Core for database handling
course.*prerequisites: COP2822, CTS2445, CTS2552 each with a grade of C or better
course.prerequisites: COP2822 Internet Programming 1, CTS2445 SQL Programming, CTS2552 Object-Oriented Programming 2

outcomes.outcome: demonstrate practical applications of software engineering methodologies and practices using C# and the MVC design pattern

objectives.objective: Develop a single-page MVC web app
Develop a data driven MVC web app
Use Bootstrap to develop a responsive MVC web app
Use Bootstrap to develop a responsive MVC web app
Test and debug a MVC web app
Work with controllers and routing, session state and cookies, model binding, and razor views
Use EF Core to work with data in a database

contact.about:
preferred method of contact is via email. I will respond to emails within 24 hours on weekdays. Published office hours are times when I will be available on Zoom for real-time communication. If you need to meet at a different time, please email me to schedule an appointment.
Discord channels are also available for anytime communication with me and your classmates.

instructor.about: Over 30 years professional experience as a software engineer and program manager. I have worked for large and small companies.
